title: Mahindra Finance aims to reduce its net NPA below 4% by March-end - Business Standard
content:
1. Mahindra Finance aims to reduce its net NPA below 4% by March-end  Business Standard
  2. M&M Finance Q3 net profit at ₹894 cr vs ₹274 cr loss a year ago  Mint
  3. M&M Financial tanks 8% as Q3 net profit falls 10% QoQ  Economic Times
  4. Our gross Stage 3 ratio should fall to 8-9% by March: Ramesh Iyer, vice-chairman & MD, Mahindra Finance  The Financial Express
  5. Mahindra Finance posts Rs 992 crore profit in Q3  Autocar Professional
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Non-banking financial company Mahindra and Mahindra Finance is aiming to reduce its net non-performing assets (NPA) ratio to below 4 per cent by March-end.
